messages.title: SAVE PUTNEY HIGH STREET
messages.content: 2005 Labour's Stuart King has been campaigning to improve Putney High Street - the most polluted high street in London - for getting on for five years. Even though the Tory council has its own campaign to smarten up Putney, precious little improvement has been evident. We need to elect local councillors who take real pride in Putney.

messages.title: COMMUTER MANIFESTO
messages.content: 2010 Stuart King launches his manifesto for commuters which includes improving the District Line and Putney mainline station. In contrast the Tories scrap the planned rail services expansion at Putney station and close it for ticket office hours to 4.5 hours a week or more.

messages.title: Ignorant council’s museum injustice
messages.content: 2010 As this recent letter to the Wandsworth Guardian shows how angry Putney is about the local museum. But Library is still wrong. Don’t reward the Tory councillors who forced this cruel option locally.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Putney is a MARGINAL. The Tories are only 1,766 votes ahead of Labour. Lib Dems can't win.

issues.environment: Labour's Stuart King has been campaigning to improve Putney High Street - the most polluted high street in London.

images.caption: Stuart King outside the closed museum.
